name: part_006
file: tmp_【#hololivefesEXPO25_DAY2】hololive 6th fes. Color Rise Harmony CREATORS' STAGE【チラ見せ】 [wCblx1C_j68]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_006.mov

scenes.description: A rolling collage of fan messages and illustrations for hololive 6th fes. Color Rise Harmony.
The 'Creators' Stage' intro showing a list of participating music producers and artists.
Venue guidelines and 'Attention' slides regarding flashing lights and vocal cheering.
A chart showing the recommended penlight colors for various hololive members, followed by more fan messages.

subtitles.original: CREATORS: かめりあ, Giga, KIRA, ZSunder, しん, すりぃ, 梨本うい, TeddyLoid, ナユタン星人, niki, ピノキオピー, ぽるし, 柊マグネタイト, ろくろ (OSSYS)
subtitles.english: CREATORS: Camellia, Giga, KIRA, ZSunder, Shin, Surii, Ui Nashimoto, TeddyLoid, Nayutalien, niki, PinocchioP, Polche, Hiiragi Magnetite, Rokuro (OSSYS)

subtitles.original:
Attention ご来場のお客様へ
演出の都合上 照明の点滅にご注意ください
声出し応援 OK です
subtitles.english:
Attention: To all visitors.
Due to production reasons, please be aware of flashing lights.
Vocal cheering is OK.

subtitles.original:
Attention For Visitors
Please be aware of flashing lights during the performance.
Cheering loudly is OK.
subtitles.english:
Attention For Visitors
Please be aware of flashing lights during the performance.
Cheering loudly is OK.
